name: Liquify Design
description:
LIQUIFY DESIGN – WHO WE ARE
OUR VALUES
Our core values are driven by a desire to help online businesses succeed. We value collaboration and speedy communication. We value great people who can achieve measurable results. We value open source development and obsessive creativity.
OUR TEAM
Our team is made up entirely of professional designers, developers and marketers from around the world. No sales people. No inexperienced support staff. Just passionate and personable people with the awesome skills to help your business grow online.
OUR APPROACH
Online success doesn’t come to businesses overnight. But with us it might come quicker (and cheaper) than it would with most web design agencies in London.
We have a streamlined workflow which enables us to hit the ground running (or rather, coding) into any project. We use rapid prototyping techniques with an iterative design cycle – a method which can be applied to any project of any size, regardless of the complexity.
Using awesome apps and collaboration tools our team are able to understand your needs, communicate effectively and push the design forward in ways you won’t have seen before.
